title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 704.5 - Intake structures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 704.5 - Intake structures

State Regulations

The location, design, construction and capacity of
cooling water intake structures, in connection with point source thermal
discharges, shall reflect the best technology available for minimizing adverse
environmental impact. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
704.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
